SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SALESFORCE ORDER MANAGEMENT
Return Order Item Tax Fields

The Return Order Item Tax object represents the tax on a return order line item or a return order item adjustment.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
NOTE Depending on your page layout and field-level security settings, some fields aren’t visible or editable.

This table lists the fields on the Return Order Item Tax object.

FIELD LABEL	DESCRIPTION
Amount	The tax amount on the return order item.
Description	The description of the return order item tax.
Order Product Tax Line Item Summary	The order product tax line item summary associated with the order item summary that corresponds to the return order line item to which the tax applies.
Rate	The tax rate used to calculate the amount.
Return Order	The return order associated with the return order item tax.
Return Order Item Adjustment	For tax on an adjustment, this field shows the return order item adjustment to which the tax applies. If this field is blank, the tax applies to a return order line item.
Return Order Line Item	For tax on a return order line item, this field shows the return order line item. For tax on an adjustment, this field shows the return order line item to which the adjustment applies.
Tax Effective Date	The date when the amount was calculated.
Type	

Indicates whether the amount on the tax line is an estimate or the final calculated amount.

Possible values are:

Actual
Estimated

title: Understanding Return Order Item Tax in Salesforce
